title: Bolsheviks: The Intellectual & Political History of the Triumph of Communism in Russia
description: The rise of the Bolsheviks is an epic Russian story that now has a definitive end. The major historian of the subject, Adam Ulam, has enlarged his classic work with a new Preface that puts the revolutionary moment, and especially Lenin, in perspective for our modern age.
author: Adam B. Ulam
